column4: hi can any one help me with this plz i am new to this Desktop effects could not be enabled
can any one help me with this
Desktop effects could not be enabled
what video card are you using ?
no - what make is the video card
do you know how to use a pastebin
check out that link, do you think you can use that ?
open up a terminal from applications -> accessories -> terminal menu and type "lspci" then use the pastebin link to show me the output
I'm sorry to say I do
you're using a Silicon Intergrated System (SIS) video card, these have very very bad support in the Xorg xserver, and even worse 3d support,
there are specific Xorg configurations for the SIS video card drivers but to even have a chance of it working you have to do a fair bit of research
9 times out of 10 it never works
a better supported card is always going to be a better option
I'm sorry it's not more positive
